feed.title: Combined summary - [META] Mailing list etiquette Re: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin

entry.title: Combined summary - [META] Mailing list etiquette Re: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin
entry.summary: The context emphasizes on the importance of maintaining a good Signal to Noise Ratio (SNR) in a mailing list. The writer urges individuals to avoid trolling and contributing to the already ridiculous SNR of the mailing list. It is important to keep in mind that messages are sent to hundreds or thousands of people, hence, the content should be well thought-out before hitting the send button. The information was originally posted on the bitcoin-dev mailing list in August 2015.
